Rice.sop:
PREP: Wash rice thoroughly and soak for 20 mins. COOK: Boil with 1:2 water ratio or steam until fluffy. 
QUANTITY LOGIC: 1 Standard Serving = 50g Raw Rice. 
SCALING: Multiply 50g x [Number of Servings]. (e.g., 2 Servings = 100g Raw Rice). 
MACROS (Approx per serving): ~180 Kcal | 40g Carbs | 4g Protein.

Roti.sop:
PREP: Knead whole wheat flour (Atta) with water to a soft dough. Rest 15 mins. COOK: Roll into discs and cook on hot tawa/flame until puffed. 
QUANTITY LOGIC: 1 Standard Serving = 2 Rotis. (Use 25g dry Atta per Roti = 50g Total Dry Atta per serving). 
SCALING: Multiply 50g x [Number of Servings]. (e.g., 2 Servings = 100g Atta -> Make 4 Rotis). 
MACROS (Approx per serving/2 Rotis): ~140 Kcal | 28g Carbs | 6g Protein.

Ghee Roti.sop:
PREP: Knead whole wheat flour (Atta) with water to a soft dough. Rest 15 mins. COOK: Roll into discs and cook on hot tawa/flame until puffed. Put 5ml ghee per roti. 
QUANTITY LOGIC: 1 Standard Serving = 2 Rotis. (Use 25g dry Atta per Roti = 50g Total Dry Atta per serving). 
SCALING: Multiply 50g x [Number of Servings]. (e.g., 2 Servings = 100g Atta -> Make 4 Rotis). 
MACROS (Approx per serving/2 Rotis): ~230 Kcal | 28g Carbs | 6g Protein.
